explains: adj. 麦芽的；含麦芽的，用麦芽作的
wordGroup: malt beer 麦牙啤酒；黑啤酒

sentences.en: German beer has traditionally been made from just four ingredients – hops, malt, yeast, and water.
sentences.cn: 德国啤酒传统上一直是只由4种原料酿造而成的–啤酒花、麦芽、酵母和水。

sentences.en: You can buy malt sugar candy at any time.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时买到麦芽糖。

sentences.en: I enjoyed the single malt they gave me, but I enjoyed the conversation much more.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他们给我的这单个单麦芽，但是，我更喜欢这交谈。
